title: Dressing up in the past
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Presents Lorri Baines, National Gallery Education Officer, demonstrating what the gallery offers children in terms of the history of clothing and costume. Using two children as models she shows how eighteen century aristocrats would have dressed and the restrictions imposed by their mode of dress.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
